amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to redirect $1 million in the NASA Exploration account to highlight the importance of addressing the facilities and maintenance backlog on NASA facilities that have a direct manufacturing responsibility related to the SLS/Orion mission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Scalise.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
